review.title: Central, comfortable with excellent service
review.reviewText: Staff went out of their way to ensure our needs were met. Thank you.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jon ,

I was delighted to read your review of Taj Campton Place and thank you for the same. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the excellent location of the hotel, it is one of the most convenient places for shopping and all the wonderful sight-seeing that the city has to offer. I am happy that you liked the amenities in our rooms too. I wish you safe travels for your future journeys and look forward to your future visit to our hotel.

Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala
General Manager
Taj Campton Place
340 Stockton Street
San Francisco
Email: cmpgm.sf@tajhotels.com

review.title: Fantastic Hotel
review.reviewText: Very comfortable hotel room, the staff were always helpful, courteous, friendly and made us feel welcome every evening when we returned.  There was a newspaper at our door every morning.  When we required some assistance i.e., bathroom lights went off when we accidentally tripped the breaker and service tech was at our room within 5 minutes.  Wonderful service.
review.positiveRemarks: The closeness to everything, i.e. Chinatown, Union Square, Fishermans Wharf, the friendliness of staff and our room was very spacious.
review.locationRemarks: Very central to street cars, buses and all amenities were very close, great stores to do some shopping i.e., Macy's, H & M, Walgreens

managementResponses.response:
Dear Firas,

I was so happy to read your review and thank you for the same. I am so glad that you apprecieted our staff, we do have an excellent team of Associates and are proud to have them work for us. I wish you safe travels for your future journeys and look forward to your future visit to our hotel.


Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala
General Manager
Taj Campton Place
340 Stockton Street
San Francisco
Email: cmpgm.sf@tajhotels.com

review.title: Great Hotel great staff
review.reviewText: Great Hotel great staff wonderful experience... Great location

review.title: Very nice boutique hotel
review.reviewText:
Hotel is beautiful. Rooms very comfortable and the staff is spectacular. Located half block from union square. 
Had breakfast there everyday a bit expensive but nicely served.
Last night we had dinner in Campton Place and this is one of the best meals we have ever had, Cali-Indian fusion was delicious. 
My family including 2 young kids really liked our stay. Definitely would stay there again. I want to try another Taj hotel somewhere else as well
This is a truly luxurious hotel in terms of room amenities and comfort. Add an unbeatable location and you have a winning combination for any SF visit.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Kelly,
Thank you for taking the time to post your review of Taj Campton Place on Expedia! I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us recently.  Our associates are always going above and beyond while looking after our guests. We hope you will come back and stay again on your future visit and that Taj will be your choice of hotel always.

Safe travels and we look forward to seeing you again!

Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala
General Manager
Taj Campton Place
340 Stockton Street
San Francisco
Email: cmpgm.sf@tajhotels.com

review.title: Great hotel!
review.reviewText: This hotel had the best customer service that I have ever received and I travel quite a bit. It's in a great location for shopping, dining, and bars. I got a great price that also included a $25 breakfast credit at the hotel restaurant. The only negative is there are no in-room coffee makers but there is free coffee in the bistro from 6am-8am. There's also a Starbucks right next door. Great stay!!

review.title: Great Downtown SF location!
review.reviewText: We love the Taj! Always consistently providing us with top level service.
Convenient location, easily accessible to shops, restaurants, Moma etc

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sir,

Thank you very much for your great review of Taj Campton Place. I am so glad that you enjoyed the location of our hotel, which is convenient for shopping and sightseeing.
I am looking forward to your next visit to our hotel, where I look forward to meeting you in person. I do appreciate the time taken by you to post this wonderful review of our hotel.

Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala
General Manager
Taj Campton Place
340 Stockton Street
San Francisco

review.title: Great hotel close to Union Square
review.reviewText: Fantastic location close to great shopping and awesome restaurants. Staff was super friendly and extremely helpful. Would highly recommend this!
Great hotel great staff, definitely will recommend to my friends. Looking forward to staying in this hotel again.

review.reviewText: Great hotel. One of the best hotels we have stayed so far. Staff was very friendly and hotel was very clean. Close to Union Square and Chinatown

review.reviewText: The staff were exceptional! The customer service was really amazing and appreciated.

review.title: Best in the city
review.reviewText: Treated like royalty staff is the most helpful the restaurant is excellant the bar lounge serves the best onion soup I have ever experienced

review.title: So friendly
review.reviewText: Stay in many hotels in San Francisco but none more friendly than Taj Compton place everything was just perfect , staff were so pleasant ,very clean , a delight to stay there .
review.positiveRemarks: Everything ,position in city  cleanliness and most of all staff ,
review.locationRemarks: Right on Union square , cable cars so close ,shopping at major shops , all forms of transport nearby just perfect .

review.title: Perfect for moscone
review.reviewText: Love the little sunken. Bistro and wines by the glass exceptional

managementResponses.response:
Dear Julie,
Thank you very much for your great review of Taj Campton Place. I am so glad that you enjoyed the location of our hotel, which is convenient for shopping and sightseeing. I am so pleased to note that you dined in our two Michelin star restaurant, which is our jewel.
I do apologize for the torn bathrobe, which is certainly not our standard form of delivery. 
I am looking forward to your next visit to our hotel, where I look forward to meeting you in person. I do appreciate the time taken by you to post this wonderful review of our hotel.

Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala
General Manager
Taj Campton Place
340 Stockton Street
San Francisco
Email: cmpgm.sf@tajhotels.com

review.title: Near Union Square
review.reviewText: This is a cozy, friendly hotel.  Close walking distance to Union Square.  The turn down service is a nice touch.  The downtown noise was not a problem.  Our room was nice and quiet
review.positiveRemarks: Nice, clean, quiet, friendly.  We enjoyed eating breakfast and dinner in the 2 restaurants.  Delicious food and great service
review.negativeRemarks: Check the bathrobes.  One had a hole under the arm.  Otherwise, everything was great.
review.locationRemarks: Union square.  Hop on the trolley.  Hop on the cable car or city bus to go all over town.  Great restaurants and bars nearby

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sir,

Thank you very much for your great review of Taj Campton Place. I am so glad that you enjoyed your meal in our two Michelin star restaurant, which we are so proud of.
I am looking forward to your next visit to our hotel, where I look forward to meeting you in person. I do appreciate the time taken by you to post this wonderful review of our hotel.

Kind Regards

Ashrafi Matcheswala

review.title: Truly Exceptional Experience
review.reviewText: We stayed in the old Campton Place Hotel many times in the past. This was our first experience of the Taj Campton Place and it was even better. Outstanding service, comfort, quiet, cleanliness and the Restaurant is in a league of its own. Getting a Michelin 2 star rating says it all. Will definitely being staying there again. 6 star rating!

review.title: Nice hotel right in or next to downtown.
review.reviewText: All good.  Clean, people were friendly, daily paper.  Walking distance to Moscone Center.
review.positiveRemarks: Room size was good for me (1 person).  Bathroom was fancy!
review.negativeRemarks: TV reception was choppy, but I don't watch much.  Breakfast was too expensive for a Ham-and-Egger from Pittsburgh.
review.locationRemarks: Starbucks next door.  Walked to the convention center and Ubered it over to AT&T park and walked back.

review.title: Nice boutique hotel
review.reviewText: I've been staying in the hotel pretty often. I feel very comfortable here and the staff is very good and caring. Rooms are clean.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel restaurant is one of my favorite, the food is great
review.negativeRemarks: I would prefer a little more comfortable matrasses
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is downtown, close to theaters, good restaurants and shopping
